title: Group Study Collaboration
description: Create or join study groups to collaborate and work together on assignments and learning activities.

title: Assignment Management
description: Easily create, assign, and submit assignments within your group with deadlines and progress tracking.

title: Real-time Messaging
description: Communicate with group members instantly using built-in messaging for better collaboration.

title: Resource Sharing
description: Share notes, links, videos, and important study materials with your group members.

title: Progress Tracking
description: Monitor assignment progress and stay updated on what’s completed and what’s pending.

title: Responsive Design
description: Access StudySync seamlessly on any device including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
